```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(stringr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
target_location <- "./RPMS/x86_64"
```

## Bioinformatics RPM packages for the `x86_64` platform. 

This page displays the RPM packages available in the current `symbioinfo`
release.

```{r create_links, results="asis", echo=FALSE}

files <- list.files(target_location)
for (file in files) {
  cat(stringr::str_interp("- [`${file}`](${target_location}/${file})\n\n"))
}
```
